query:
SELECT 
  pt.id,
  pt.txid,
  pt.amount,
  pt.status,
  pt.createdAt,
  pt.paidAt,
  pt.updatedAt,
  c.id as customerId,
  c.email,
  c.balance,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, pt.createdAt, NOW()) as minutes_ago
FROM pix_transactions pt
JOIN customers c ON pt.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com'
  AND pt.amount = 100
ORDER BY pt.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 3;

SELECT 
  pt.id,
  pt.txid,
  pt.amount,
  pt.status,
  pt.createdAt,
  pt.paidAt,
  pt.updatedAt,
  c.id as customerId,
  c.email,
  c.balance,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, pt.createdAt, NOW()) as minutes_ago
FROM pix_transactions pt
JOIN customers c ON pt.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com'
  AND pt.amount = 100
ORDER BY pt.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 3;
